definitions.body: basin (pool, well ?) [[מַיִם]] ´[[ג]] Jos 15:19 = Ju Jdg 1:15; om. ´[[מ]] Jos 15:19, Jos 15:19 = Ju Jdg 1:15, Jdg 1:15 (prob. old

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of lamp, i.e. oil-receptacle Zec 4:3, also v:Zec 4:2, where MT [[גֻּלָּהּ]] as if fr. [[[גּׁל]]]; rd. [[גֻּלָּה]] Brd Ges:§ 91. 1, R. 2; (> Hi-St Bö:§ 734 b De on Ps 27:5 Sta:§ 347 c, who think [[גֻּלָּהּ]] = [[גֻּלָּתָהּ]]);—so also Ec 12:6 [[גֻּלַּת הַזׇּהָב]]

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of bowl- or globe-shaped portion of capitals of the two pillars in temple 1Ki 7:41, 1Ki 7:41, 1Ki 7:42 = 2Ch 4:12, 2Ch 4:12, 2Ch 4:13.
